name: Tangle Lake
description:
Tangle Lake lets you explore the wonders of Samuel Daggue's 1802 book. Inside you will find tales of a missing daughter, corporate greed and Arctic anomalies. Be prepared for the unknown.

  • Arrow keys or WASD to explore.

Created using Adam Le Doux's Bitsy (special thanks goes out to Sean LeBlanc for the hacks)
